articles.description: Online renegades took the investing world by storm. Investors can ignore some of the silliness, but the market may never be the same.
articles.content: For 10 months, GameStop was a depressing emblem of the Covid-era economymany of its stores sat closed or empty, dust gathering on out-of-date game discs that had been supplanted by digital alternativ… [+330 chars]
